title: Is Chipotle Overrated?
description:
Although there's a huge variety of Mexican restaurants in the United States, Chipotle is ranked as the US consumer favorite-- but is corn salsa and slick branding enough to deserve the hype? Today, we're asking: Is Chipotle Overrated?
